game.name: Hit Duck
game.description:
The biggest shooting fun is here for you. We are proudly invited to try this brand new arcade challenge where you have to shoot ducks to score your points. Hit Duck is a free online action game where your objective is to hit the ducks and make the minimum score to clear the present level and reach the advanced one. Your good performance in the game will help you get some exclusive and exciting bonuses and prizes.
You will be given some bullets to shoot ducks in the beginning. Do not need to bother if they are finished as you will again get more bullets after clicking the recharge button! Try to shoot as many ducks as you can to secure the highest score and be on the top on the leaderboard! Remember this is a time-based game so you need to be very quick to prove your skill in this one of the best html5 1player casual games for kids. 
Put your shooting skill to test as you will lose some points if you miss your target each time! You can play this mobile shooter game in all the modern browsers for free without a need of downloading any particular apps or software. The use of html5 technology in its making allows it to be playable on android phones and iPads and iPhones. Good luck to play like a champion shooter, with no install required! Check out more gun shooting games here on atmegame.com!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Hit Duck at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!
